categories: Category:Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi

nodes.text: The Weapon of a Jedi, Part 1

"The Weapon of a Jedi, Part 1" (German: "Die Waffe eines Jedi, Teil 1") is the first installment of "Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi," a comic adaptation of the novel The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure, by Jason Fry. The comic was written by Alec Worley and drawn by Ruairí Coleman, with colors by Chris O'Halloran. It was printed in issue 19 of Star Wars - Magazine and published on March 29, 2017.
